description: Full Exoskeleton + Game Project + Repo scaffold. Contains Godot 4 demo, batches 1-7, VFX, cutscenes, missions, and repo scaffold for GitHub.
batches_included: Batch 1: animations placeholders, boss scene, skill tree, cutscene manager, SFX placeholders
Batch 2: animation blending scripts, Boss AI, HUD health bars, BGM placeholder
Batch 3: Enemy HP Bars, Dodge I-Frames, Boss Telegraphs, Combo Meter, Mission Manager, Cutscene UI, Game Over Screen
Batch 4: Camera shake, hit-pause, enhanced enemy AI, parry mechanic, stamina system, finisher cinematic, NPC generator, hazard area, lore & cutscenes integrated
Batch 5: Gameplay integration, VFX placeholders, NPC scene and spawner updates, hazard variants
Batch 6: VFX particles and scenes (spark, electric arc, fire vent, hit flash), dash trail scene
Batch 7: Cutscene manager linking, auto-play mission cutscenes
notes: Open the project in Godot 4. Copy this repo to your GitHub. For iOS export, follow docs/iOS_BUILD.md.
